title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-host LLMs (Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma…) with a single CLI or REST API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node & browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; sync & async, generator streaming.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain adapter to use Ollama models for chat, tools, retrieval, agents.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, multi-user, dark mode).

title: ollama-compose
summary: Docker-Compose stack adding Open-WebUI, Postgres, Qdrant, nginx to Ollama.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS-Code extension bringing local Ollama models as GitHub-Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI with syntax highlighting, history, markdown rendering.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin to chat, generate & refactor code with Ollama models.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained .NET SDK for Ollama; supports chat, embeddings, list/pull.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app exposing Ollama with session memory, parameters UI.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that caches & serves Ollama models inside CI pipelines.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama generators & embedders in NLP pipelines.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate wrapping Ollama REST API with tokio streaming.

title: ollama-grpc
summary: gRPC server shim exposing Ollama services for high-performance micro-services.

title: ollama-slackbot
summary: Slack Bolt bot that answers questions using local Ollama models.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord.py bot bringing Ollama chat & image generation to any server.

title: ollama-on-bentoml
summary: BentoML service template to scale Ollama models behind an adaptive API gateway.
